column4: hey all :) Quick question, is it just me or is http://packages.ubuntu.com/ down?...
seems to me the site is dead or something... ??
any other place I can get some packages for Ubuntu, on an Windows computer
I was going to carry it over to my Ubuntu from a thumb drive...
I'd love to: http://packages.ubuntu.com/ the site is down
intersting they have a mod distro for mythtv. but I also found it here; http://mirror.anl.gov/pub/ubuntu/pool/multiverse/m/ :)
